summary: This is an email exchange from December 5, 2019, between an FBI agent and a U.S. Attorney's Office prosecutor regarding scheduling a status call about the Jeffrey Epstein case. It shows ongoing coordination between law enforcement agencies on the investigation.

persons.name: Ted
persons.role: Recipient of email, likely a prosecutor or law enforcement official
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an FBI agent requesting a status call about the Epstein case.

events.title: Request for Epstein case status call
events.description: An FBI agent emails a prosecutor named Ted to schedule a quick status call regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: Email shows ongoing FBI and U.S. Attorney's Office coordination on the Epstein case in December 2019.
The correspondence is between an FBI agent and a prosecutor from the Public Corruption Unit of the SDNY.
The email references a prior communication from November 25, 2019, indicating continued discussion.
